mapper.select: select g.*, m.no memberNo, m.Id memberId, m.name memberName from guestBook g left outer join member m on(m.no = g.memberNo) order by g.no desc
mapper.insert: insert into guestBook values ( seq_guestBook.nextval, #{name}, #{email}, #{passwd}, #{content}, sysdate, #{memberNo} )
mapper.delete: delete from guestBook where no = #{no} and passwd = #{passwd}
mapper.select: select no from member where id = #{id} and passwd = #{passwd}
